thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com | 2 of 30
thread.title: Katie M.

author: Katie M.
title: Katie M.
text: Great product (although I am not a fan of the taste, but that's a personal thing not a company problem). Timely delivery. They followed up with a costumer service phone call to make sure I received everything and was happy with my product. It was a very nice personal touch to have the company check in to make sure I was pleased with the product and the process (which I was).
